summary: Water quality is stable and within acceptable ranges for Blue Nile tilapia and plants.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH around 7.0-7.5 for optimal growth.
Keep TDS levels between 300-500 ppm for healthy fish and plant growth.
Monitor temperature; maintain between 24-28°C for tilapia health.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.035 / 7.007 / 7.106 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 331.12 / 307.8 / 340.6 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 24.912 / 21.31 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
